title: The XPS 13 laptop gets a massive $234 price cut at the Dell semi-annual sale
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Get the powerful XPS 13 laptop on sale for $715.39
article: Dell's semi-annual sale is happening right now with fantastic deals on its best-selling laptops, like the powerful XPS 13, that's on sale for $715.39 (was $949.99). That's a massive $234.60 price cut and the best deal we've seen for the 13-inch laptop.

The Dell XPS 13 laptop features a 13.3-inch InfinityEdge non-touch display and packs 8GB of RAM, 256GB SSD, and an 11th generation intel core i5-1135G7 processor. The 2020 laptop received an upgraded battery life of 19 hours, and the new webcam is now placed above the display. Perfect for students and travel, the lightweight XPS 13 is Dell's smallest 13-inch laptop to date and weighs just 2.7 pounds. Keep in mind, Dell's semi-annual sale ends tomorrow, so we recommend taking advantage of today's stellar deal while you can.

See more laptop sales with the best cheap laptop deals and today's best Dell XPS 13 and 15 deals and prices. You can also see more bargains with our roundup of the best Amazon deals and look forward to upcoming offers during the 2021 Black Friday deals event.
